summary: This document is an invoice summary from FedEx addressed to Jeffrey Epstein, detailing charges for express shipment services. It includes information about transportation charges, customs fees, and payment instructions.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the recipient of the FedEx invoice, indicating he utilized their express services.

keyFacts: The invoice is dated April 27, 2006, and details charges amounting to USD $32.48.
The invoice includes a note about a new Customs User Fee implemented by the Dominican Republic.
The document mentions FedEx services and includes payment instructions for Jeffrey Epstein.
There are references to customs duties and other fees associated with shipments.
The document is marked as confidential.
